NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription Your location is used to show your position on the map and for location-based services within the web content.
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription Your location is needed for continuous location-based services.
NSCameraUsageDescription Camera access is needed to use camera-based features in web content.
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription Microphone access is required to capture audio in web content.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription Access to the photo library is needed to upload photos in web content.
NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription Permission is needed to save files from the web to your photo library.
